revised_title: Arthur Elijah Trueman: A Pioneering Geologist and Educator
tldr: Arthur Elijah Trueman was a renowned geologist and educator who made significant contributions to the fields of paleontology, stratigraphy, and geology education. He established flourishing geology departments at several universities and inspired generations of students, many of whom became prominent scientists. Trueman's passion for science extended beyond academia, as he actively engaged with local amateur societies and contributed to the popularization of geology.
